column5: Why study this courseOur MSc in Global Ecology and Conservation aims to train the ecologists and conservationists of the future.With a changing climate, an increasing human population, and growing rates of extinction and habitat loss, the world is facing unprecedented challenges. To meet these challenges and preserve our wildlife and ecosystems, we need innovative and adaptable scientists who can develop conservation strategies with real impact.
